name: flatbuffers-language-server
description: Go-to-definition, autocomplete and more for FlatBuffers schema files.

untrustedWorkspaces.description: This extension runs a language server binary configured in settings. A malicious actor could exploit this to run arbitrary code on your machine.

flatbuffers.languageServer.path.markdownDescription: Path to a flatbuffers-language-server binary. Download the latest release [here](https://github.com/smpanaro/flatbuffers-language-server/releases). This overrides any binaries found in the system PATH or managed by the extension (see [Auto Download](#flatbuffers.languageServer.autoDownload)).

flatbuffers.languageServer.autoDownload.description: Controls whether the extension should automatically download the latest language server binary.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
